What would you advise as the main takeaways from our findings? Two things stand out to me. One is that the federal government really needs a strategy against gender based violence, whether that is is passing a law that sexual offenses law that, amongst other things, really penalizes sexual assaults, that raises the age of marriage to 18. That deals with lots of aspects of women and girls safety. It could take that forward. And. It's not simply symbolic. And then I think finally having more women in security forces so that there are women at checkpoints and protection for women in security forces at the same time.
